en.modificationSaved: Modifications successfully saved. You will receive an email to confirm your submission.
en.modificationFailed: An error occured on modification saving
en.launchMail: This will launch a pop-up containing the required details to send by mail. Copy/paste the content and be careful not to spam :)
en.gitInstructions: Create or modify with the below text and send a pull-request to .
en.subject: Subject
en.whyEmail: To allow us to fight abuses, you will be asked to confirm your submission by email. We won't make your email public and won't use it for anything else!
en.tellUsWhatYouDid: Tell us what you did there!
en.considerUsingGithub: ProTip™ : if you plan to contribute often to the documentation, consider using Git/Github directly!
en.fallback_to_english: The page requested is not yet available in your favourite language. Instead, here is the english version. If you wish to start translating this page, please go to [this page]({url_to_start_translation}).

fr.modificationSaved: Les modifications ont été enregistrées. Une confirmation par email va vous être demandée.
fr.modificationFailed: Une erreur est survenu pendant l’enregistrement
fr.launchMail: Ce bouton va lancer un pop-up contenant les détails à envoyer par courriel. Copiez/collez le contenu et relisez-vous bien :)
fr.gitInstructions: Créez ou modifiez avec le texte ci-dessous puis envoyez une pull-request sur .
fr.subject: Sujet
fr.whyEmail: Pour nous permettre de combattre les abus, nous vous demanderons de confirmer votre proposition de changement par email. Nous ne renderons pas cette adresse publique et ne l'utiliserons pas à d'autres fins !
fr.tellUsWhatYouDid: Dites-nous ce que vous avez changé !
fr.considerUsingGithub: ProTip™ : si vous prévoyez de contribuer souvent à la documentation, nous vous recommendons d'utiliser Git/Github directement !
fr.fallback_to_english: La page demandée n'est pour le moment pas disponible en français. Voici à la place la version en anglais. Si vous souhaitez commencer une traduction de cette page, vous pouvez vous rendre sur [cette page]({url_to_start_translation}).

ar.modificationSaved: تمت عملية الإحتفاظ بالتعديلات بنجاح. سوف تتلقى بريدا إلكترونيا لتأكيد ما قمت بإرساله.
ar.modificationFailed: طرأ خلل أثناء عملية الإحتفاظ بالتعديلات
ar.launchMail: This will launch a pop-up containing the required details to send by mail. Copy/paste the content and be careful not to spam :)
ar.gitInstructions: Create or modify with the below text and send a pull-request to .
ar.subject: الموضوع
ar.whyEmail: To allow us to fight abuses, you will be asked to confirm your submission by email. We won't make your email public and won't use it for anything else!
ar.considerUsingGithub: ProTip™ : إن كنت ترغب في المساهمة الدائمة في إثراء الوثيقة، فننصحك بالقيام بذلك على  جيت/جيت هب مباشرة !
ar.fallback_to_english: The page requested is not yet available in your favourite language. Instead, here is the english version. If you wish to start translating this page, please go to [this page]({url_to_start_translation}).

it.modificationSaved: Modifiche salvate con successo. Riceverai una email per confermare il tuo invio.
it.modificationFailed: Si è verificato un errore durante il salvataggio delle modifiche
it.launchMail: Questo aprirà un popup contenente i dettagli richiesti per inviare la mail. Copia/incolla il contenuto e fai attenzione a non spammare :)
it.gitInstructions: Crea o modifica con il testo sottostante e invia una richiesta a .
it.subject: Oggetto
it.whyEmail: Per aiutarci a combattere gli abusi, ti sarà chiesta conferma del tuo invio via email. Non renderemo la tua email pubblica e non la useremo per nient'altro!
it.considerUsingGithub: ProTip™ : se stai pensando di contribuire spesso alla documentazione, considera di usare direttamente Git/Github!
it.fallback_to_english: The page requested is not yet available in your favourite language. Instead, here is the english version. If you wish to start translating this page, please go to [this page]({url_to_start_translation}).

oc.modificationSaved: Modificacions corrèctament enregistradas. Recebretz un messatge per confirmar vòstra demanda.
oc.launchMail: Lançarà una fenèstra surgissenta amb los detalhs de mandar per corrièl. Copiatz-pegatz lo contengut e agachatz de pas 'spamar' :)
oc.gitInstructions: Creatz o modificatz amb lo tèxte çai-jos puèi enviatz la pull-request al .
oc.subject: Subjècte
oc.whyEmail: Per nos permetre de lutar contra las abuses, vos cal confirmar la demanda per corrièl. Publicarem pas vòstra adreça electronica e l'utilizarem pas per quicòm mai !
oc.considerUsingGithub: ProTip™ : se prevesètz de contribuir sovent a la documentacion, vos recomandam d'utilizar dirèctament lo repaus Git/Github !
oc.fallback_to_english: The page requested is not yet available in your favourite language. Instead, here is the english version. If you wish to start translating this page, please go to [this page]({url_to_start_translation}).
